metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2591 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: 389-ds-base before version 1.3.6 is vulnerable to an improperly NULL terminated array in the uniqueness_entry_to_config() function in the "attribute uniqueness" plugin of 389 Directory Server. An authenticated, or possibly unauthenticated, attacker could use this flaw to force an out-of-bound heap memory read, possibly triggering a crash of the LDAP service.

notes.Note: leosilva> the project changed its site. That's the current one: https://pagure.io/389-ds-base for commits from the older site, just copy the sha and paste with /c/<sha-commit>

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
